short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avian wallet in the browser. Send and receive instantly on any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avian is a safe and secure crypto-currency. This browser wallet is designed for receiving Avian and making Avian payments online.

Payments can take anywhere from one minute to ten minutes to be confirmed in the blockchain, however, transaction fees are very small (typically 0.0001 AVN).
